messages.content: This cheat... what would that be? I may have made a choice I'm currently regretting.
I'm sorry you needed to add this. I thought your humour was pretty obvious, but this is reddit....
Yes of mine worry, no one liked mine either.
Same. You all tried to save me, but I rewatched with the sound on and... I have regrets.
So America and the USSR are the exact same thing to you? Sorry you're so small minded, hope you learn to grow in the future.
Sorry, but [NAME] is too POWERFUL, not to be his own character. But seriously i definitely now want this.
I see notifications of people commenting the source but this sub must auto delete or something. Sorry, guys. I binged her and found me quick though.
Wow I’m sorry. Can you take pictures of your bruises? What was she nagging you about?
I have the worst memory ever. Idk if it's from all the weed I smoked but I also have a blank mind like all the time.
Sorry you can’t enjoy things cause other people enjoy them lol. Your loss
Sorry if this has been covered a bunch but what happened on the play where [NAME] got injured?
Right like interacting with each other having a normal evening? Ugh they’re both so trashy I’m sorry.
No one ever laid on their death bed and said, “I regret not working even harder.”
That feeling when your mascot is there but none of his players. Sorry Youppi
I’m sorry to be that guy, but I don’t get it
As an [NAME], I apologize for the cranky old conservatives who are probably making ridiculously uninformed comments about your country right now :/
EDIT: wrong link sorry here’s the right one I hope
Damn, I really been playing this series all my life...and I ain’t got any regrets.
I’m sorry to hear that friend :(. It’s for the best most likely if she didn’t accept you for who you are
It's racism. It doesn't make me angry, it makes me feel sorry for their ignorance and yours.
just apologize. what other advice could you possibly require? you fucked up, now deal with it.
Sorry to hear about that and hope you have moved on.
I thought that was gonna be the Pelicans after [NAME] is gone(sorry Pelicans fans)
Read his post again. 'It's more fact based than Fox.' I'm sorry but you might have some extra chromosomes.
I’m so sorry the internet has inconvenienced you
I'm sorry your trust has been that badly broken.
Holy bait-and-switch, [NAME]. I’m so sorry, that has to be incredibly stressful to have to be around and deal with.
Sorry, but anarcho-anything are bot welcome there
want* a source on that, sorry.
I feel sorry for people that think Reddit (or even some random sub-reddit) is "an international stage".
Sorry. I know I should be grateful and happy.
